Name: ArcticBoy: The Interactive Story
About the game: ArcticBoy Story - This is an interactive movie with first-person gameplay elements based on the acclaimed history of the Arctic Kokold. Young Alexei living on the distant island of Spitsbergen, in search of fun, finds the post of a lonely girl living in the city of Barentsburg. She really wants rolls. Brought up to help single girls, Alexey decides to immediately deliver those same rolls and charm her with his kindness, but not everything goes as Alexei wants. -Beautiful graphics -Cinematic cutscenes -Riding a snowmobile -Search for sticks -Sound by professional actors Drive your snowmobile to the distant city of Barentsburg. Make your way through blizzards and snow. Don't let the bear ruin the rolls and save Anya from hunger.
